Peak.name: Kovaaks - VALORANT
Peak.review: Most scenarios are not made specifically for valorant, so there are scenarios that cover a relevant aim mechanic, but not to the extent of direct use in valorant. This means you will be practising additional irrelevant aspects of aim mechanics making scenarios very inefficient.
